Questions.Question: Which cartoon character is the main protagonist in the game 'Sonic the Hedgehog'?
Questions.Explanation: Sonic is the speedy blue hedgehog who battles against the evil Dr. Robotnik in 'Sonic the Hedgehog'.

Questions.Question: In the game 'Kingdom Hearts', which Disney character teams up with Sora?
Questions.Explanation: Donald Duck is one of the main characters who joins Sora on his journey in the Disney and Final Fantasy crossover game 'Kingdom Hearts'.

Questions.Question: Which cartoon series is the inspiration for the game 'Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles'?
Questions.Explanation: The game 'Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles' is based on the popular cartoon series of the same name, featuring the crime-fighting turtles.

Questions.Question: Which cartoon character is the main antagonist in the game 'Crash Bandicoot'?
Questions.Explanation: Dr. Neo Cortex is the primary villain in the 'Crash Bandicoot' game series, constantly scheming against Crash.

Questions.Question: Which cartoon character is the sidekick of the main protagonist in the game 'Rayman'?
Questions.Explanation: Globox is the loyal sidekick of Rayman, assisting him throughout the game with his unique abilities.

Questions.Question: Which cartoon series is the inspiration for the game 'The Powerpuff Girls: Chemical X-Traction'?
Questions.Explanation: The game 'The Powerpuff Girls: Chemical X-Traction' is based on the animated series about three super-powered girls fighting crime.

Questions.Question: Which cartoon character is the main protagonist in the game 'Mega Man'?
Questions.Explanation: Mega Man, also known as Rockman, is the heroic robot fighting against the evil Dr. Wily in the 'Mega Man' game series.

Questions.Question: In the game 'Disney Infinity', which cartoon character can players control in a virtual sandbox?
Questions.Explanation: In 'Disney Infinity', players can control various Disney characters, including the iconic Mickey Mouse, in a virtual sandbox world.

Questions.Question: Which cartoon character is the main antagonist in the game 'Spyro the Dragon'?
Questions.Explanation: Ripto is the main antagonist in the 'Spyro the Dragon' game series, constantly causing trouble for the heroic dragon, Spyro.

Questions.Question: In the game 'LEGO Marvel Super Heroes', which cartoon character is a playable character?
Questions.Explanation: Spider-Man is one of the playable characters in 'LEGO Marvel Super Heroes', joining forces with other Marvel superheroes to save the world.

Questions.Question: Which cartoon series is the inspiration for the game 'Avatar: The Last Airbender'?
Questions.Explanation: 'Avatar: The Last Airbender' is a game based on the animated series about a young boy with the ability to manipulate the elements.

Questions.Question: Which cartoon character is the main protagonist in the game 'Kirby's Adventure'?
Questions.Explanation: Kirby, the pink puffball, is the main character in 'Kirby's Adventure', known for his ability to inhale enemies and copy their powers.

Questions.Question: In the game 'LEGO Star Wars: The Complete Saga', which cartoon character is a playable character?
Questions.Explanation: Yoda, the wise Jedi Master, is a playable character in 'LEGO Star Wars: The Complete Saga', battling against the dark side.

Questions.Question: Which cartoon character is the main antagonist in the game 'Donkey Kong Country'?
Questions.Explanation: King K. Rool, the leader of the Kremlings, is the main villain in the 'Donkey Kong Country' game series.

Questions.Question: In the game 'Disney's Aladdin', which cartoon character is the player controlling?
Questions.Explanation: In 'Disney's Aladdin', players control the titular character, Aladdin, as he embarks on a magical adventure in Agrabah.

Questions.Question: Which cartoon series is the inspiration for the game 'SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle for Bikini Bottom'?
Questions.Explanation: 'SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle for Bikini Bottom' is a game based on the popular animated series about a cheerful sponge and his underwater friends.

Questions.Question: Which cartoon character is the main protagonist in the game 'Earthworm Jim'?
Questions.Explanation: Earthworm Jim, a heroic and humorous earthworm in a robotic suit, is the main character in the game 'Earthworm Jim'.

Questions.Question: In the game 'LEGO DC Super-Villains', which cartoon character is a playable character?
Questions.Explanation: The Joker, the iconic Batman villain, is a playable character in 'LEGO DC Super-Villains', causing chaos and mischief in the LEGO DC universe.

Questions.Question: Which cartoon character is the main antagonist in the game 'The Legend of Spyro'?
Questions.Explanation: Malefor, the Dark Master, is the main antagonist in 'The Legend of Spyro' game series, threatening the world with his evil powers.

Questions.Question: In the game 'LEGO Harry Potter: Years 1-4', which cartoon character is a playable character?
Questions.Explanation: Harry Potter, the famous wizard, is a playable character in 'LEGO Harry Potter: Years 1-4', reliving his magical adventures at Hogwarts.
